p: Besides, users can also limit searches using ranges of physiochemical data, e.g., maximum and minimum values of TPSA (Topological Polar Surface Area) ( Figures 3A– C ). Database snapshots of these properties and parameters showing chemical constituents of essential oil, GC–MS data and months wise variations in oil yield ( Figure 3A ), essential oil trade data and comparative graphical plots ( Figure 3B ), and aroma molecule description and 3D structure for downloads ( Figure 3C ).
